lead_paragraph: The Sports of The Times column on Sunday, about Brittany Ryan, a kicker for the Lebanon Valley College football team in Annville, Pa., misidentified a university for which another young woman, Katie Hnida, once kicked. It was New Mexico, not New Mexico State. The column also misstated, in some editions, the name of the university where Liz Heaston became the first woman to score in a college football game by kicking two extra points in 1997. It is Willamette, not Williamette University.
